summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by adding a dedicated class to the “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch on ResidentProfilePage and defining global CSS rules in index.css to set the switch thumb color to green when unchecked and white when checked, without modifying files under frontend/src/components/ui. However, the diff also includes substantial unrelated global styling changes (theme palette and global Radix surface enforcement) that were not requested and risk impacting other UI elements.

hallucinated_features.description: Global enforcement that all Radix UI dialog/popover/dropdown/select/etc. surfaces must be solid white (and dark-mode overrides), which restyles other components across the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states not to restyle other switches/toggles elsewhere in the app; more broadly, this change affects many UI surfaces unrelated to the specific Resident Profile switch.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of a broad OKLCH “Healthcare-themed” global color palette and related base CSS variable changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the BuildRequest only asks to change the thumb color for one specific toggle.

hallucinated_features.description: New global utility class `.dialog-solid-white` and associated styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 and unrelated to the specified toggle thumb-color change.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata updates adding AR-1/AR-2 feature request entries marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the UI requirement; no request to update project_state.json.
